descr_EMPTYPASSWORD.pt-br: Sua conta tem uma senha vazia. Por favor, recupere a senha para criar uma nova.

descr_WRONGUSERPASS.pt-br: O usuário e a senha que você digitou não coincidem. Tente novamente.

descr_ACCOUNTINACTIVE.pt-br: Sua conta está inativa. Verifique a página de dúvidas.

descr_EMAILNOTVALIDATE.pt-br: Seu endereço de e-mail não foi validado. Por favor, verifique os procedimentos para validação.

descr_PWDNEEDCHANGE.pt-br: Você está usando uma senha gerada automaticamente. Você deve alterar antes de continuar. Por favor, verifique os procedimentos para alteração.

report_trackid.pt-br: If you report this error, please also report this tracking number which makes it possible to locate your session in the logs available to the system administrator:

debuginfo_text.pt-br: The debug information below may be of interest to the administrator / help desk:

report_text.pt-br: Optionally enter your email address, for the administrators to be able contact you for further questions about your issue:

report_explain.pt-br: Explain what you did when this error occurred...

howto_text.pt-br: This error probably is due to some unexpected behaviour or to misconfiguration of SimpleSAMLphp. Contact the administrator of this login service, and send them the error message above.

descr_CREATEREQUEST.pt-br: An error occurred when trying to create the SAML request.

descr_DISCOPARAMS.pt-br: The parameters sent to the discovery service were not according to specifications.

descr_GENERATEAUTHNRESPONSE.pt-br: When this identity provider tried to create an authentication response, an error occurred.

descr_LDAPERROR.pt-br: LDAP is the user database, and when you try to login, we need to contact an LDAP database. An error occurred when we tried it this time.

descr_LOGOUTREQUEST.pt-br: An error occurred when trying to process the Logout Request.

descr_METADATA.pt-br: There is some misconfiguration of your SimpleSAMLphp installation. If you are the administrator of this service, you should make sure your metadata configuration is correctly setup.

descr_NOACCESS.pt-br: This endpoint is not enabled. Check the enable options in your configuration of SimpleSAMLphp.

descr_NORELAYSTATE.pt-br: The initiator of this request did not provide a RelayState parameter indicating where to go next.

title_PROCESSASSERTION.pt-br: Error processing response from Identity Provider

descr_PROCESSASSERTION.pt-br: We did not accept the response sent from the Identity Provider.

title_PROCESSAUTHNREQUEST.pt-br: Error processing request from Service Provider

descr_PROCESSAUTHNREQUEST.pt-br: This Identity Provider received an Authentication Request from a Service Provider, but an error occurred when trying to process the request.

descr_SLOSERVICEPARAMS.pt-br: You accessed the SingleLogoutService interface, but did not provide a SAML LogoutRequest or LogoutResponse. Please note that this endpoint is not intended to be accessed directly.

descr_ACSPARAMS.pt-br: You accessed the Assertion Consumer Service interface, but did not provide a SAML Authentication Response. Please note that this endpoint is not intended to be accessed directly.

descr_SSOPARAMS.pt-br: You accessed the Single Sign On Service interface, but did not provide a SAML Authentication Request. Please note that this endpoint is not intended to be accessed directly.

descr_ARSPARAMS.pt-br: You accessed the Artifact Resolution Service interface, but did not provide a SAML ArtifactResolve message. Please note that this endpoint is not intended to be accessed directly.

descr_CASERROR.pt-br: Error when communicating with the CAS server.

descr_NOTVALIDCERT.pt-br: You did not present a valid certificate.

descr_NOTSET.pt-br: The password in the configuration (auth.adminpassword) is not changed from the default value. Please edit the configuration file.

errorreport_text.pt-br: The error report has been sent to the administrators.

descr_LOGOUTINFOLOST.pt-br: The information about the current logout operation has been lost. You should return to the service you were trying to log out from and try to log out again. This error can be caused by the logout information expiring. The logout information is stored for a limited amout of time - usually a number of hours. This is longer than any normal logout operation should take, so this error may indicate some other error with the configuration. If the problem persists, contact your service provider.

descr_NOTFOUND.pt-br: The given page was not found. The URL was: %URL%

descr_NOTFOUNDREASON.pt-br: The given page was not found. The reason was: %REASON%  The URL was: %URL%

descr_BADREQUEST.pt-br: There is an error in the request to this page. The reason was: %REASON%

descr_RESPONSESTATUSNOSUCCESS.pt-br: The Identity Provider responded with an error. (The status code in the SAML Response was not success)

descr_NOCERT.pt-br: Authentication failed: your browser did not send any certificate

descr_INVALIDCERT.pt-br: Authentication failed: the certificate your browser sent is invalid or cannot be read

descr_UNKNOWNCERT.pt-br: Authentication failed: the certificate your browser sent is unknown

descr_USERABORTED.pt-br: The authentication was aborted by the user

descr_NOSTATE.pt-br: State information lost, and no way to restart the request

descr_AUTHSOURCEERROR.pt-br: Erro no método de autenticação %AUTHSOURCE%. O erro foi: %REASON%

descr_MEMCACHEDOWN.pt-br: Your session data cannot be retrieved right now due to technical difficulties. Please try again in a few minutes.

descr_INVALID_DSN.pt-br: O dsn informado no config é inválido

title_INVALID_DSN_USERNAME.pt-br: Nome de usuário no DSN é inválido

descr_INVALID_DSN_USERNAME.pt-br: O username informado no config é inválido

descr_INVALID_DSN_PASSWORD.pt-br: A senha informada no config é inválida

descr_INVALID_SITEKEY.pt-br: O sitekey informado no config é inválido

descr_INVALID_LDAP_HOSTNAME.pt-br: O hostname do LDAP não foi informado

descr_INVALID_LDAP_ATTRIBUTES.pt-br: Os atributos do LDAP não foram definidos na configuração

descr_INVALID_LDAP_SEARCH_BASE.pt-br: O atributo do LDAP search.base não foi definido na configuração

descr_INVALID_LDAP_SEARCH_ATTRIBUTES.pt-br: O atributo do LDAP search.attributes não foi definido na configuração

descr_INVALID_LDAP_SEARCH_USERNAME.pt-br: O atributo do LDAP search.username não foi definido na configuração

descr_INVALID_LDAP_SEARCH_PASSWORD.pt-br: O atributo do LDAP search.password não foi definido na configuração

descr_ERROR_DO_LOGIN_DB_EXECUTE.pt-br: Erro ao consultar base de dados. Impossível continuar
